summary: This mod adds a nice little player home located next to Falkreath. Up to now it includes alchemy and enchanting stations, as well as some storage and a library. Later I'll try to implement other features, such as companions and perhaps a little story-quest. ^^
descriptionHtml:
Introduction

Once ago Falkreath was a mighty kingdom, controlling large parts of the actual Cyrodiil. The kings resided in a large castle, near their capital. After the foundation of the empire and the breakup of the kingdom, it was deserted. Now the ruin remains a silent witness of Falkreaths lost glory.
But the day will come on which the castle will be seized by a worthy hero, who will restore the past, rebuild it to its old glory.
You are this hero.......

******************************************************************************************************************************************
Information

This mod adds a nice little player home located next to Falkreath. Up to now it includes alchemy and enchanting stations, as well as some storage and a library. Later I'll try to implement other features, such as companions and perhaps a little story-quest.

v0.95
< Weaponracks do not work at the moment - mannequins are fully functional >

v0.99
< The castle interior has largely been remodeled, so take care that you removed everything you stored in the chests. For an unknown reason the pathgrid doesn't work, but I'm up to it. I also added a new book (The royal Chronicles of Falkreath), which should tell a small part of the history of the hold (at this state of work it only includes some pages, but if you like it, I would try to write more) >


******************************************************************************************************************************************
Requirements

Skyrim
Dragonborn-DLC

I recommend yout to download and use the mod "Designs of the Nords" by KEBW1144 ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13429//? ). It is not necessary, but the castle looks really great with his banner-retextures ;)
****************************************************************************************************************************************
Credits

Up to now none

I just wanted to say clearly that the changed banners ARE NOT INCLUDED in my mod. They are just the retextures I use, and so you can see them on my pictures.


******************************************************************************************************************************************
Compatibility

The mod should be compatible with almost every other mod, even with those changing falkreath

******************************************************************************************************************************************

Have fun ;)

If you like it please take the time to give some feedback and to endorse it ;)
author: LordGeneral

files.name: Falkreath - Ancient Glory
files.changelogHtml:
